name: ChatGPT
description: The versatile conversational AI that can write, edit, brainstorm, code, and summarize almost anything.
credits: Free with GPT-3.5. GPT-4o is also available for free with usage limits.

name: Google Gemini (formerly Bard)
description: Google's AI assistant, deeply integrated with Google Search for real-time, up-to-date information.
credits: Completely free.

name: Copy.ai
description: An AI writer focused on marketing copy, blog posts, and social media content with numerous templates.
credits: 2,000 words per month forever.

name: Grammarly
description: AI-powered writing assistant that checks for grammar, spelling, tone, clarity, and plagiarism.
credits: Basic grammar, spelling, and punctuation suggestions.

name: QuillBot
description: An AI-powered paraphraser and summarizer that helps you rephrase text and condense information.
credits: Paraphrasing with 125-word limit and 2 writing modes.

name: Notion AI
description: AI built directly into your Notion workspace to write, summarize, brainstorm, and organize.
credits: Limited free AI responses per user.

name: Jasper AI
description: A high-end AI content platform known for its quality outputs and brand voice capabilities.
credits: 7-day free trial.

name: Rytr
description: A simple, fast, and affordable AI writer that helps you create content in minutes.
credits: 10,000 characters per month forever.

name: Wordtune
description: AI that helps you rewrite and rephrase your sentences to sound more natural and compelling.
credits: 10 rewrites per day.

name: HyperWrite
description: An AI assistant that helps you write, research, and communicate smarter with features like AutoWrite and Summarizer.
credits: Limited generations per day.

name: WriteSonic
description: An AI writing platform with a focus on SEO-optimized content and factual accuracy.
credits: 10,000 words per month (GPT-3.5).

name: HubSpot AI
description: A suite of AI tools integrated into HubSpot's CRM for content generation, prospecting, and reporting.
credits: Many AI features available in the free CRM plan.

name: SurferSEO
description: AI-powered tool that analyzes top-ranking pages to give you data-driven guidelines for SEO optimization.
credits: Limited analysis with a free account.

name: Brand24
description: AI-powered social listening tool to track mentions of your brand, competitors, and keywords across the web.
credits: 14-day free trial.

name: Synthesia
description: Create professional AI videos from text in over 120 languages, using AI avatars.
credits: Free demo video creation.

name: Tidio
description: A live chat and chatbot platform that uses AI to answer customer questions and capture leads.
credits: Free plan with basic chatbots and live chat for up to 3 operators.

name: Crisp
description: All-in-one customer service platform with AI-powered chatbots and a knowledge base.
credits: Generous free plan including chatbots and knowledge base.

name: Seamless.AI
description: AI-powered sales tool to find verified contact information for your target audience.
credits: Limited free credits to find contacts.

name: Smartwriter.ai
description: Generate hundreds of personalized outreach messages for cold emails and LinkedIn.
credits: 7-day free trial.

name: Lavender
description: An AI email assistant that helps you write better sales emails faster by scoring and providing suggestions.
credits: Limited free credits per month.

name: Albert.ai
description: An autonomous AI marketer that buys media, manages campaigns, and optimizes across channels.
credits: Demo required, enterprise-focused.

name: Canva Magic Studio
description: A suite of AI tools within Canva, including Magic Design (text-to-image), Magic Edit, and Magic Erase.
credits: Generous free credits for Magic Studio features.

name: Midjourney
description: A top-tier AI image generator known for its artistic and high-quality outputs, accessed via Discord.
credits: Limited free trial, often paused during high demand.

name: Leonardo.Ai
description: Create high-quality game assets, art, and images with fine-grained control and community-trained models.
credits: 150 daily free credits.

name: Microsoft Designer (Image Creator)
description: A graphic design app powered by DALL-E 3, allowing you to create images from text descriptions.
credits: Free with Microsoft account (Boosts for faster generation).

name: Ideogram
description: An AI image generator with a strong ability to create images with accurate and coherent text.
credits: 25 prompts per day (100 prompts per week).

name: Remove.bg
description: Instantly remove the background from any image in 5 seconds with a single click.
credits: Free for low-resolution previews. One free high-res download per month.

name: PhotoRoom
description: Create product and portrait pictures using AI-powered background removal and templates.
credits: Free with PhotoRoom credits and watermarks.

name: Uizard
description: AI-powered UI design tool that transforms screenshots, sketches, or text prompts into editable mockups.
credits: 2 free projects.

name: Looka
description: Use AI to generate endless logo ideas, brand kits, and social media assets.
credits: Free to generate low-resolution logo samples.

name: Stockimg AI
description: Generate all kinds of images, including logos, book covers, posters, and stock photos, with AI.
credits: Limited free monthly credits.

name: Zapier
description: Connect your apps and automate workflows using AI to describe the automation you want to build.
credits: Free plan with 100 tasks/month and limited Zaps.

name: IFTTT (If This Then That)
description: Create simple applets that trigger actions between different devices and apps.
credits: Free plan with 2 applets.

name: Motion
description: An AI calendar that automatically builds your perfect schedule, prioritizing tasks and resolving conflicts.
credits: Free for individuals with limited AI features.

name: Fireflies.ai
description: An AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and summarizes your meetings.
credits: Free plan with 800 minutes of storage per seat/month.

name: Otter.ai
description: Real-time transcription and meeting summaries for Zoom, Google Meet, and MS Teams.
credits: 300 monthly transcription minutes (30 mins per conversation).

name: Tome
description: AI-powered storytelling tool to generate and share presentations, one-pagers, and narratives.
credits: Free with limited AI credits.

name: Gamma
description: Generate beautiful, engaging presentations, documents, and websites in seconds.
credits: Free with 400 AI credits.

name: Mem.ai
description: A self-organizing workspace that uses AI to connect your notes, tasks, and knowledge.
credits: Free with search limitations.

name: Perplexity AI
description: A conversational search engine that provides direct answers with cited sources.
credits: Completely free with standard model.

name: Bardeen
description: A browser extension for automating manual web tasks with a no-code playbook builder.
credits: Free for non-commercial use.

name: Julius AI
description: An AI data analyst that can analyze your data, create visualizations, and generate reports.
credits: Free with up to 15 messages per month.

name: Polymer Search
description: Transform your spreadsheets into an intelligent, interactive database with a simple chat interface.
credits: Free plan with limited responses and data sources.

name: Microsoft Copilot (in Excel)
description: AI assistant inside Excel that helps you analyze data, create charts, and identify trends with natural language.
credits: Requires Microsoft 365 Copilot subscription (paid).

name: Elicit
description: AI research assistant that uses language models to find relevant papers and summarize key information.
credits: Free with limited credits.

name: ChatDOC
description: Chat with your documents (PDF, DOC, etc.) to extract information, summarize, and find answers instantly.
credits: Free with 2 documents and 20 questions per day.

name: Akkio
description: A no-code platform for building and deploying AI models for data prediction and forecasting.
credits: Free trial.

name: MonkeyLearn
description: A no-code Text Analytics platform to extract insights from text data like surveys, reviews, and tickets.
credits: Free plan with 300 queries/month.

name: Public.com
description: While an investment platform, its AI-powered 'Alpha' feature provides data-driven insights on stocks.
credits: Free to use on the platform.

name: TalktoBooks
description: An experimental Google AI tool that lets you ask questions and find answers within a library of books.
credits: Completely free.

name: Microsoft Power BI
description: Business analytics tool with AI features like Q&A (natural language queries) and key influencers.
credits: Power BI Desktop is free. Service has a free tier.

name: GitHub Copilot
description: Your AI pair programmer that suggests code completions and entire functions in real-time.
credits: Free for verified students, teachers, and maintainers of popular open source projects.

name: Tabnine
description: An AI code assistant that provides high-quality code completions trained on open-source code.
credits: Free for basic code completion.

name: Replit Ghostwriter
description: An AI pair programmer inside the Replit IDE that can explain, edit, and generate code.
credits: Limited free tier.

name: Cursor
description: A code editor built with AI at its core, allowing you to chat with your codebase and generate features.
credits: Free with a 200 GPT-4 limit and unlimited GPT-3.5.

name: What The Diff
description: AI that writes pull request descriptions and sends summaries to non-technical stakeholders.
credits: Free for open-source and personal repositories.

name: Mintlify
description: Automatically generate beautiful, interactive documentation for your codebase.
credits: Free for open-source projects.

name: CodiumAI
description: An AI assistant that helps you write meaningful tests, suggest code improvements, and find bugs.
credits: Free for individual developers.

name: Bugasura
description: AI-powered bug tracker that helps you report, track, and manage bugs more efficiently.
credits: Free for small teams.

name: v0 by Vercel
description: Generate UI components with text prompts using AI, powered by Tailwind CSS and shadcn/ui.
credits: Free with a waitlist and usage limits.

name: BoltAI
description: A native macOS app that gives you instant access to ChatGPT and other models across all your apps.
credits: Free with paid options for more features.

name: RunwayML
description: A suite of AI magic tools for video editing, generation, and manipulation, including Gen-2 text-to-video.
credits: 125 free one-time credits.

name: Descript
description: Edit video and podcasts like a doc. Automatically transcribe, remove filler words, and clone your voice.
credits: 1 hour of transcription per month.

name: Kapwing
description: Online video editor with AI features like automatic subtitles, background removal, and text-to-video.
credits: Free with 4-minute video export limit and watermark.

name: LALAL.AI
description: High-quality stem splitter to extract vocal, drum, bass, and other instruments from any audio or video.
credits: 10 minutes of free preview (non-downloadable) packs.

name: ElevenLabs
description: Generate realistic voiceovers and clone voices with cutting-edge AI voice synthesis.
credits: 10,000 characters per month.

name: Pictory
description: Turn scripts, blog posts, and long-form videos into short, shareable video clips using AI.
credits: 3 free video projects, each up to 10 minutes long.

name: Veed.io
description: Simple online video editor with AI features like auto-subtitles, eye contact correction, and background noise removal.
credits: 10 minutes of video export per month with watermark.

name: InVideo
description: Create videos from text prompts or use templates with a large stock library and AI-powered editing.
credits: 10 minutes of video export per week with watermark.

name: Cleanvoice AI
description: Automatically remove filler words, mouth sounds, and dead air from your podcast or audio recording.
credits: 30 minutes of free audio processing.

name: Podcastle
description: An all-in-one platform for podcasting with AI-powered recording, editing, and magic dust audio enhancement.
credits: 3 hours of audio transcription per month.

name: Chatbase
description: Create an AI chatbot trained on your own data (website, documents, etc.) to answer customer questions.
credits: 1 chatbot with 30 message credits per month.

name: Botpress
description: An open-source conversational AI platform for building and deploying chatbots.
credits: Free cloud tier with limitations.

name: Dante AI
description: Build a custom GPT chatbot trained on your data in minutes, with no coding required.
credits: 1 chatbot with 15 message credits per day.

name: Poe by Quora
description: Access a variety of AI bots from different creators (including ChatGPT, Claude, etc.) in one app.
credits: Free with daily message limits on advanced bots.

name: Intercom
description: Customer communication platform with an 'AI Agent' that can resolve common customer issues.
credits: AI Agent add-on is paid, but core chat has a free plan.

name: Drift
description: Conversational marketing and sales platform with AI-powered chat to engage buyers.
credits: Free plan for basic chat widgets.

name: Collect.chat
description: Build custom chatbots for your website without coding to interact with visitors.
credits: Free plan with 50 leads per month.

name: Dialogflow
description: Google's natural language understanding platform for building conversational interfaces.
credits: Free tier with generous limits for small projects.

name: Remini
description: AI-powered photo enhancer that can unblur, restore, and upscale old or low-quality photos.
credits: Free with ads and limited processing.

name: You.com
description: A search engine with integrated AI chat and apps, allowing for a more interactive search experience.
credits: Free with advanced search modes.

name: WolframAlpha
description: A computational knowledge engine that answers factual queries by computing answers from structured data.
credits: Free with limited step-by-step solutions.

name: Character.AI
description: Create and interact with AI characters, from historical figures to fictional creations.
credits: Free with message limits during peak times.

name: Soundraw
description: Generate unique, royalty-free music by selecting a mood, genre, and length.
credits: Free to create and bookmark songs, license required for download.

name: MyHeritage AI Time Machine
description: Upload a photo to see how you might have looked in different historical periods.
credits: Free initial trial, then requires payment.

name: Meal Planner Pro
description: Get personalized meal plans and recipes based on your dietary preferences and goals.
credits: Free AI meal plan generation.

name: Luma AI
description: Capture 3D models of real-world objects using just your phone's camera.
credits: Free to capture and share.

name: Superhuman
description: An email client designed for speed, with AI features to categorize emails and compose replies.
credits: 30-day free trial, then paid subscription.
